<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: .tit a@text&&.time@text##路 浠婃棩鏇存柊.+|\n<js>result.replace(/\s*路\s*/g, ' 路 ')</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2浜�')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2涓�')
    .replace(/\.0([涓囦嚎])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' 路 ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '杩炶浇' : '瀹岀粨'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '鐐瑰嚮');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '鏈堢エ');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '杩炶浇' : '瀹岀粨',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' 路 ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('浣滃搧鐩稿叧'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^姝ｆ枃\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//娉ㄦ剰锛氫竴鑸綉绔欓粯璁ら椤�(鍗砨aseUrl)鏈夋悳绱㈡锛屽惁鍒欒濉叆鎼滅储椤甸潰鍦板潃
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nwww.yushubo.com\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//妗岄潰鐗圲A
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//鎵嬫満鐗圲A
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //璇疯嚜琛岄€夋嫨UA锛屸啌鈫撯啌濉叆姝ゅ
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//娉ㄦ剰锛氫竴鑸綉绔欓粯璁ら椤�(鍗砨aseUrl)鏈夋悳绱㈡锛屽惁鍒欒濉叆鎼滅储椤甸潰鍦板潃
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nwww.babayu.com\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//妗岄潰鐗圲A
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//鎵嬫満鐗圲A
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //璇疯嚜琛岄€夋嫨UA锛屸啌鈫撯啌濉叆姝ゅ
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
